  • Uses of Color.AbstrEasing in camzup.core

    Subclasses of Color.AbstrEasing in camzup.core
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Color.MixCieLab
    Eases between two colors in CIE LAB color space.
    static class 
    Color.MixCieLch
    Eases between two colors in CIE LCH color space.
    static class 
    Color.MixHsl
    Eases between colors by hue, saturation and lightness.
    static class 
    Color.MixHsv
    Eases between colors by hue, saturation and value.
    static class 
    Color.MixLrgb
    Converts two colors from standard RGB to linear RGB, mixes them with linear interpolation, then converts back to standard RGB.
    static class 
    Color.MixSrgb
    Eases between two colors in sRGB, i.e., with no gamma correction.
